R

rand - Static variable in class Client
Random number generator used for probabilistic token denial.
reader - Variable in class RequestHandler
Reader for receiving text commands from the client (optional in single-command mode).
readLine(DataInputStream) - Static method in class Client
Reads a single line from the data stream, terminated by newline.
ReceivedToken - Static variable in class Client
Counter for the number of tokens received by this client while downloading.
RequestHandler - Class in Unnamed Package
Handles a single client connection and processes file-related requests on the server side.
RequestHandler(List<Socket>, Socket, FileStorage, List<ServerFile>, Map<String, List<TrustedClient>>) - Constructor for class RequestHandler
Constructor used in interactive mode (command will be read from input stream).
RequestHandler(List<Socket>, Socket, BufferedReader, PrintWriter, String, FileStorage, List<ServerFile>, Map<String, List<TrustedClient>>) - Constructor for class RequestHandler
Constructor used in single-command mode (used for trusted client interaction).
run() - Method in class RequestHandler
The main execution method for this request handler.
